member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Modules.Core.Models.InputListOptionPageModel.DefaultValue
member.summary: The default value for the type represented by this option if not populated, otherwise the actual value of the object

member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Modules.Core.Models.InputListOptionPageModel.SetAnchor
member.summary: Dirty hack to determine if the embedded view calling this is the first outer wrapper in its hierarchy. This is used to figure out what the delete button should be referencing when removing a list item.

member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Modules.Core.Models.InputListOptionPageModel.ValueProperty
member.summary: A property representing the "key" for the object for use in complex associations
